Hero.description: Accelerate development with enterprise-grade architecture, pre-configured workflows, and modular design system.

theme.title: Dynamic Theming
theme.description: Custom color schemes with real-time preview

darkMode.title: Dark Mode
darkMode.description: Auto-adaptive dark/light mode with system sync

auth.title: Auth Ready

more.title: And More

Hero.hoverPrompt: Explore features above to learn more

SectionThree.descriptionAuthenticated: You're now accessing privileged features with enterprise-grade security. Manage your session and account settings below.
SectionThree.descriptionUnauthenticated: Experience secure, seamless authentication with our identity management system. Protect your data with military-grade encryption and real-time session monitoring.

SectionFour.title: Seamless Theme & State Management
SectionFour.description: Experience the perfect harmony between design and functionality. Our intuitive controls demonstrate real-time state synchronization across components while maintaining pixel-perfect aesthetics.

features.themeSwitching: Instant theme switching with zero layout shift

Counter.title: Live Counter Demo
Counter.subtitle: Async state updates with persistence
Counter.persistenceText: Counter state persists across page reloads and theme changes

sectionTwo.breakLanguageBarriers: Break language barriers with real-time localization. Switch between multiple languages instantly while maintaining perfect UI layout and typography across all locales.

firstname.min: First name must be at least 3 characters

lastname.min: Last name must be at least 3 characters

validation.email: You must give a valid email

password.min: Your password must be at least 8 characters long
password.max: Your password cannot be longer than 64 characters
password.pattern: Password should contain only alphabets and numbers

username.min: Username must be at least 2 characters
username.max: Username must be less than 30 characters

bio.min: Bio must be at least 4 characters
bio.max: Bio must be less than 160 characters

signin.title: Welcome Back
signin.description: Sign in to continue to your account

signup.headline: Sign Up
signup.description: Create an account to access your dashboard, manage your events, and connect with your community.

forgotpassword.title: Reset Password
forgotpassword.description: Enter your email to reset your password
forgotpassword.checkEmail: Check your inbox for further instructions

resetpassword.title: Reset Password
resetpassword.successDescription: You can now login with your new password

profile.usernameDescription: This is your public display name. It can be your real name or a pseudonym. You can only change this once every 30 days.
profile.emailDescription: You can manage verified email addresses in your email settings.
profile.bioDescription: You can @mention other users and organizations to link to them.
profile.urlsDescription: Add links to your website, blog, or social media profiles.

account.nameDescription: This is the name that will be displayed on your profile and in emails.
account.dobDescription: Your date of birth is used to calculate your age.
account.languageDescription: This is the language that will be used in the application interface.
